comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: Quote from: maudo on February 12, 2023, 01:15:18 PMHi i am looking who can exchange about 1k usd BTC to USDT fast.will pay up to 10% feesLet's discuss about terms and fees - telegram @xcoinaWILL NOT GO FIRST.ðŸš«Why didn't you use a wallet with exchange function? The fee is around 5%, no KYC and it's safe. Wallets such as Ledger, Atomic wallet, Exodus and others have this.It's much less stress than dealing with some obvious scammers.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: AHOYBRAUSE on February 17, 2023, 04:59:25 PMWhy didn't you use a wallet with exchange function?It is simple. The user is a wallet with an exchange function from where there is a chance of scams. Can't, you see that a newbie (posting time of this thread) trying to take 1000$ while no one trusts a newbie for 5$ only? If OP can get 1000$ then what will happen to the sender?
